{"id":1367530733677,"title":"Frontline Flea Spray (400ml)","handle":"frontline-flea-spray-400ml","description":"\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003eFrontline Home Gard is an aerosol surface spray for use in the home and surrounding environments (carpets, cracks \u0026amp; crevices in flooring, animal bedding, soft upholstered furniture, car) to eradicate fleas and prevent re-infestation. \u003c\/span\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\n\u003cul\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003eKills fleas for 6 weeks \u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003ePrevents the development of flea eggs for 12 months \u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/li\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003eOne can covers 100 square meters (equivalent to an average 3-bedroom house) \u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/li\u003e\n\u003c\/ul\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003eFrontline Home Gard complements regular on-pet flea treatments.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"bop-content-body content-body util-margin-bottom-small\"\u003e\n\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eHow to use: \u003c\/strong\u003e\u003c\/span\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003eRemove pets and children from the area and remove\/cover fish tanks prior to treatment. Ensure treated areas are well ventilated. \u003c\/span\u003e\n\u003c\/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"bop-content-body content-body util-margin-bottom-small\"\u003e\n\u003cbr\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003eSpray lightly from a distance of 50 cm (knee height), a 5 second burst per 2 square meter of surface. {"id":1367417159789,"title":"Feliway Diffuser Spray (20ml)","handle":"feliway-diffuser-spray-20ml","description":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003eFeliway Spray is a fast and effective pheromone therapy to help you manage your feline friend’s anxiety levels, keeping them calm and composed. Cats, like people, are complicated creatures. Sometimes they get stressed, or agitated. Perhaps you've brought a new cat into the family, or your cat has returned from a stressful stay at the vets.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003eWhatever the scenario, a stressed cat might behave in any number ways, doing strange things such as scratching your furniture, marking the walls or carpets with urine or even becoming aggressive towards you or other cats.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003eSimply shake and apply Feliway Spray to any marked areas, waiting 15 minutes before allowing your cat back into the room to ensure the alcohol carrier in Feliway to evaporate. Never punish your cat for urine or scratch marking as this can further stress your cat and exacerbate the problem. Continue using Feliway Spray until you notice your cat repeatedly marking with their own facial pheromones.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e","published_at":"2018-07-15T19:59:31+01:00","created_at":"2018-07-15T20:04:21+01:00","vendor":"Feliway","type":"Accessories","tags":["brand_Feliway","Category_Accessories","Category_Home","Pet_Cats"],"price":1600,"price_min":1600,"price_max":1600,"available":false,"price_varies":false,"compare_at_price":null,"compare_at_price_min":0,"compare_at_price_max":0,"compare_at_price_varies":false,"variants":[{"id":12445211820141,"title":"Default Title","option1":"Default Title","option2":null,"option3":null,"sku":"","requires_shipping":true,"taxable":false,"featured_image":null,"available":false,"name":"Feliway Diffuser Spray (20ml)","public_title":null,"options":["Default Title"],"price":1600,"weight":20,"compare_at_price":null,"inventory_quantity":0,"inventory_management":"shopify","inventory_policy":"deny","barcode":"3411112121748","requires_selling_plan":false,"selling_plan_allocations":[]}],"images":["\/\/portopets.co.uk\/cdn\/shop\/products\/Feliway_Spray.jpg?v=1531681464"],"featured_image":"\/\/portopets.co.uk\/cdn\/shop\/products\/Feliway_Spray.jpg?v=1531681464","options":["Title"],"media":[{"alt":"Feliway Diffuser Spray (20ml)","id":1062154076269,"position":1,"preview_image":{"aspect_ratio":1.0,"height":500,"width":500,"src":"\/\/portopets.co.uk\/cdn\/shop\/products\/Feliway_Spray.jpg?v=1531681464"},"aspect_ratio":1.0,"height":500,"media_type":"image","src":"\/\/portopets.co.uk\/cdn\/shop\/products\/Feliway_Spray.jpg?v=1531681464","width":500}],"requires_selling_plan":false,"selling_plan_groups":[],"content":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003eFeliway Spray is a fast and effective pheromone therapy to help you manage your feline friend’s anxiety levels, keeping them calm and composed. Cats, like people, are complicated creatures. Sometimes they get stressed, or agitated. Perhaps you've brought a new cat into the family, or your cat has returned from a stressful stay at the vets.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003eWhatever the scenario, a stressed cat might behave in any number ways, doing strange things such as scratching your furniture, marking the walls or carpets with urine or even becoming aggressive towards you or other cats.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"color: #000000;\"\u003eSimply shake and apply Feliway Spray to any marked areas, waiting 15 minutes before allowing your cat back into the room to ensure the alcohol carrier in Feliway to evaporate. Never punish your cat for urine or scratch marking as this can further stress your cat and exacerbate the problem. Continue using Feliway Spray until you notice your cat repeatedly marking with their own facial pheromones.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e"}

{"id":1365763063917,"title":"Lilys Kitchen - Kitten (85g)","handle":"lilys-kitchen-kitten-85g","description":"
This Curious Kitten recipe is full of all the nutrients your kitten needs to grow into a healthy, happy cat. With 65% meaty greatness, it has a scrumptious mix of freshly prepared chicken, pork, trout and beef to keep your kitten interested, and to help them discover different flavours - so they’re braver with new meals as they grow.
 

It’s a nutritionally complete and balanced recipe with chelated minerals and omega 3 & 6 to help provide the purrrfect start for every kitten. Only proper meat is used and the recipes contain no nasties whatsoever.

As cats haven’t naturally evolved to eat grains, this recipe is completely grain free. It leaves more room for meat and offal, which is full of nutrients like taurine to keep your kitten healthy, and taste to keep your kitten happy.

  • The rest is a perfect balance of moisture for hydration, with added vitamins and chelated minerals to help maximise nutrient absorption
  • Complete and balanced nutrition including essential taurine, vital for your cat’s health
  • 100% organic, naturally nutritious and grain free recipe
  • Only proper meat: no meat or fish meal, no bone meal, no rendered meat - ever
